title: About
text: The Virtual Academy (Virtuelle Akademie) is a research and development unit at the Bern University of Applied Sciences, focused on the intersection of technology and education.

title: virtuelleakademie
text:
Dozenten

Dr. Andrew Ellis and Dr. Stefan Hackstein are researchers at the Virtual Academy of the Bern University of Applied Sciences. Their research focusses on how artificial intelligence can be used effectively in educational systems.

title: About
text: The Virtual Academy (Virtuelle Akademie) is a research and development unit at the Bern University of Applied Sciences, focused on the intersection of technology and education.

title: About
text:
Our Team
Dr. Andrew Ellis and Dr. Stefan Hackstein are researchers at the Virtual Academy of the Bern University of Applied Sciences. Their research focuses on how artificial intelligence can be used effectively in educational systems.

title: About
text:
Our Work
We explore innovative approaches to integrating artificial intelligence into educational contexts, developing tools and methodologies that enhance learning experiences and educational outcomes.
